first_para: Sir Robert Andrew Stunell OBE MP (born 24 November 1942) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Hazel Grove, and was first elected at the 1997 general election. From 2010 to 2012 he served as the Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State at the Department of Communities and Local Government.

full.extract:
Sir Robert Andrew Stunell OBE MP (born 24 November 1942) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Hazel Grove, and was first elected at the 1997 general election. From 2010 to 2012 he served as the Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State at the Department of Communities and Local Government.
^ Articles and speeches - Newsroom - Department for Communities and Local Government
full.title: Andrew Stunell
